newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Sweden sets auction of 12 bln Skr worth of T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Sweden sets auction of 12 bln Skr worth of T-bills.

text.p: Sweden's National Debt Office said on Wednesday it would invite bids from the market for an auction of 12 billion crowns of Treasury bills.
The auction will take place on March 19, it said and bids are due by 1130 GMT on March 19. Settlement date is March 21.
Maturity date Issue volume Number of days
